title: God in the White House: A History: How Faith Shaped the Presidency from John F. Kennedy to George W. Bush
description: Randall Balmer, one of Americaâ€™s top historians, explores the role of personal piety and public displays of faith in each of the modern presidencies--from J.F.K to George W. Bush--and shows how these change according to the times and what they reveal about the man sitting in the Oval Office.
author: Randall Balmer
